name: BattleStorm
description: Battlestorm is an arcade-style shoot-em-up game, inspired by the old 90s classics!It will challenge you to multitask, engaging air & ground targets while dodging enemies to collect powerups, and trying to keep your multiplier alive all at the same time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or above Processor: Dual-Core 2.0GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics with min 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Quad-Core 3.0GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD HD 7870 with 2GB VRAM or more DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
